gbmj.protocol.serveraction



interface ServerAction;


abstract @property Player target();


abstract ClientAction visit(Client);

interface ServerReactionDealError: gbmj.protocol.serveraction.ServerAction;


interface ServerReactionHu: gbmj.protocol.serveraction.ServerAction;


interface ServerReactionDiscard: gbmj.protocol.serveraction.ServerAction;
